title: Safe Space Ep 31: My Dad Sam
description: Thanks for tuning into another episode of Safe Space with Sam Tripoli.  On this episode I interview my Dad, Sam Tripoli, while he was out here in LA for my movie premiere.  We discuss how he met my mom, our family, my childhood and my comedy career. I hope you will bare with me and enjoy this very special episode of Safe Space! This Thursday, I have Greg Carlwoods from Higherside Chats on Tin Foil Hat!  Thank you for all of the support!
